about.roles: Hi there! I'm a Data Engineer and Full-Stack Developer.
about.introduction_content: I love building creative and scalable end-to-end web solutions and data products. Let's collaborate to bring your ideas to life!

stats.stat_description: Products developed and delivered for Enterprises

skills.skills_description: As a flexible technologist, I bring a special viewpoint to developing end-to-end solutions for challenging issues. I have a background in software engineering and a strong grasp of creating web applications with modern frameworks like React and Node.js. Additionally, I have experience designing and constructing cloud data pipelines, which convert raw data into actionable insights by integrating diverse data sources and formats. I have developed and improved many schemas for both SQL and NoSQL databases.  I have also worked with data warehousing tools like Amazon Redshift and Google BigQuery. I thrive as a committed problem solver when I can connect business and technology to produce significant results.

skills_content.skill_name: Data Pipelines on Google Cloud Platform
Data Pipelines on Amazon Web Services

project_content.project_name: Metacent, an end-to-end data product for NFT investments
project_description: NFTs are a booming market and many investors are struggling to navigate the market to invest in valuable NFTs. Metacent, our end-to-end data product facilitates the investors and the NFT creators to make better NFT investments.
Our product provides curated statistical analysis on transactional performance of a collection through transaction mapping, and ranks each NFT of a collection based on Rarity.

The platform also establishes the relationship between the rarity and price of an NFT in addition to providing a price evaluation for each NFT based on comparing three different machine learning models

blog_posts.blog_title: Five Golden Rules for Cleaning Data in Power BI
blog_posts.blog_description: The article discusses the importance of data cleaning and transformation in Power BI in order to improve query performance and save Power BI's internal memory space. It goes over the five golden rules for efficiently cleaning data in Power BI.

This article explains how YouTube's recommendation system works. It describes the general recommendation system overview, the recommendation system architecture, and the factors that YouTube optimizes in reliance on the attributes of watch history, search history, demographic features, and channels.

This article provides a comprehensive introduction to big data, its definition, applications, and the need for big data technologies. It also covers the different forms of big data and the criteria for determining if a firm requires big data technologies to address its problems.

recommendation_content.recommendation_content: I had the pleasure of working with Swaathi and supervising her work. She designed and developed the front end for our demos (UI) and mock-ups of our analytical dashboard. She did excellent work, gave appropriate estimates on time, was capable of independent work, yet knew when to ask questions. She was very easy and pleasant to worth with and happily re-adjusted when work or the team required it. Plus she was very reliable on delivery time and quality! I would definitely recommend her to other teams and future employers.

Swaathi has exceptional skills in UI development with HTML, CSS, Javascript and Node JS. She is extremely committed and passionate about learning new technologies. I had worked with her in a couple of projects and besides her excellent work on UI development and Full Stack JS, she also has insights and proposals on improving the user experiences of the product. It was definitely my pleasure to work with Swaathi for a short span of time. She is definitely a great asset to any team.
